    Q

    qaHelper - Variable in class databasePart1.DatabaseHelper
    A QAHelper object to access the QA database methods.
    QAHelper1 - Class in databasePart1
    Database helper for the Question, Answer and Review database tables.
    QAHelper1(DatabaseHelper) - Constructor for class databasePart1.QAHelper1
    Constructor
    QATableRow - Class in application
    The QATableRow class is a wrapper used for dynamically representing rows in a table that displays questions, answers, and reviews.
    QATableRow(QATableRow.RowType, String, Integer, Integer) - Constructor for class application.QATableRow
    Constructs a QATableRow with a row type, text content, a content ID, and an author ID.
    QATableRow(QATableRow.RowType, String, Integer, Integer, List<String>) - Constructor for class application.QATableRow
    Constructs a QATableRow with a row type, text content, a content ID, an author ID, and a list of related IDs.
    QATableRow(QATableRow.RowType, String, Integer, List<String>) - Constructor for class application.QATableRow
    Constructs a QATableRow with a row type, text content, a content ID, and a list of related IDs.
    QATableRow.RowType - Enum Class in application
    Enum representing the type of row.
    Question - Class in application
    Represents a question posted by a user along with its metadata.
    Question() - Constructor for class application.Question
    Default constructor for Question.
    Question(Integer, String, String, Integer, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, List<String>) - Constructor for class application.Question
    Constructs a Question without components and preferred answer.
    Question(Integer, String, String, Integer, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, List<String>, int, User) - Constructor for class application.Question
    Constructs a Question without the author name.
    Question(Integer, String, String, Integer, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, List<String>, int, User, String) - Constructor for class application.Question
    Constructs a Question without related IDs.
    Question(Integer, String, String, Integer, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, List<String>, int, User, String, List<String>) - Constructor for class application.Question
    Constructs a Question with all details including related IDs.
    Question(String, String) - Constructor for class application.Question
    Constructs a Question with a title and text.
    Question(String, String, Integer) - Constructor for class application.Question
    Constructs a Question with a title, text, and author ID.
    QUESTION - Enum constant in enum class application.QATableRow.RowType
    Represents a question row.
    QuestionAndAnswerAutomation - Class in tests
